column1: full, outside off, and he prepares to sweep. Hits him outside the stumps and so the lbw appeal is turned down
full outside off, and he clatters this through the off side for four! Minimal footwork, and he uses his strength to hammer it into the extra cover fence
full outside leg stump, trying to cramp Stirling for space. He makes room and drives down to mid on
full, on off, and he taps it down the ground to long on for a walking single
full, on middle, and he gets behind the line of the ball before nudging it off his waist to the leg side

full, and much wider outside off. He drives, but off the bat's slice to point. Fielder dives, stops the ball, and then releases it swiftly. Keeper whips the bails off, but the batsman was just in. Looked close, but O'Brien was safe. Was out if it was a direct hit
good length, on middle, and angling away. Punched off the back foot, but finds Rashid at cover point
good length, on leg stump, and tapped off the back foot. Struck back to the bowler
good length, on leg stump, and flicked to Zazai at square leg. Another dangerous single attempted, and o'Brien may have been out had the fielder got the direct hit
back of a length, on middle, and he stands tall to hammer a pull to the fielder at deep midwicket
full, on off, and he muscles a drive past the fielder at mid off!
good length on middle. Makes room and punches through extra cover! Nice footwork to get leg-side of the ball's line
full, outside off, and turning in. He drives with the spin to wide long on for a jogging single
full and wide outside off. He goes down on one knee and sweeps to wide long on again
full, on off. He makes room and creams a drive past mid off's left. The fielder gives the ball a mighty chase, but the ball beats him on this occasion
full, on off, and he's down on one knee before paddle sweeping a six over fine leg! Judged the line early, and then adjusted his stance accordingly
good length, outside off, and he looks to play the cut. Beaten by the pace
exposes all three stumps before paddling a sweep very fine. This was a full ball, wide outside off, and O'Brien adjusted swiftly to get in position for that finely placed shot
good length on middle, angling across his body, and he opens the bat's face to glide a cute shot past short third man for four
good length on middle, and angling across. Offers the bat's full face to defend past the bowler's right
put away! Back of a length, on leg stump, and he swivels to deposit a pull over deep backward square
good length, on leg, and nudged off his hips to square leg for a single
good length, on middle. Slower from Shapoor. Worked off his pads to short fine leg
good length, on middle, and tapped towards point for a quick single
full and wide, but Stirling unnecessarily makes extra room. Mistimes his swipe to cover
back of a length, very wide outside off stump. Left alone and Ireland collect a wide
full outside off, but swinging inwards. Worked away to midwicket
good length ball, on off stump. Pushed off the front foot to cover
full, just outside off, and he goes for a wild heave over the leg side. But the batsman's been totally deceived by the slower ball. Through to the keeper
good length, outside off, and he flat-bats a shot to long on
slower ball, again. Full, just outside off, and deceived once more. Mistimes the drive to mid off
in the air! But past the diving cover fielder. Good length delivery, on off, but O'Brien makes room before cutting in front of square for four
good length, just outside off, and turning in. Fended
up and over! Overpitched outside off, and he muscles a lofted six over extra cover
full on leg stump, and turning further down. He misses the sweep, but the ball hits his pads before rolling towards fine leg. Bit of a misfield in the deep allows them to comfortably take two
one bounce four to the long off fence. Good length on middle, and pumped off the back foot to clear mid off

and Mujeeb gets the last laugh! Ireland lose O'Brien at the end of the powerplay. This was full on leg, and he misses the sweep, beaten by the quicker ball. The delivery just clips the outside of leg stump and the big man is out bowled
good length on middle, and angling into leg. Looks to work it leg side but leading edge sends the ball back to the bowler
good length outside off, and he clatters a cut past point! Power...
good length, on middle, and he looks to pump this through the leg side. Ball stays low and hits the top of his pads
slower ball, fullish outside off. He's through the drive too early, and so the ball hits the top-half of his bat
good length, outside off, and he tries to cut, but the lack of pace forces him to mis-hit once more
back of a length, on middle, and he pulls behind square. Couple of bounces to fine leg
back of a length, outside off, and beaten by the skiddy nature of the delivery. Misses the cut
full, outside off, and this time he times it beautifully. Tiny prod forward to get to the pitch of the ball, after which his bat does the rest. Races away to the cover boundary
back of a length, on middle stump. He wants to pull square but squirted towards long on instead
good length on middle, and he prepares to punch off the back foot. But the ball takes an inside-edge and hits his pads instead
back of a lide off, and this time he wants to ride the bounce for the punch. Under-edged into the deck, and the bowler runs across to intercept. Stirling scampers back
full, outside off, and driven to extra cover
full, on off, and he drives straight past the bowler to long off
back of a length, on middle, and he rocks back before pulling over deep midwicket! Massive...
back of a length, outside off, and punched to sweeper cover. Just one single on offer
good length, outside off, and he mistimes a cut to deep point
good length, very wide outside off, and he toe-ends a cut to deep point
full outside off, and he tries to go for an expansive drive. Edged to gully, Shapoor, but he drops it!
good length, on middle, and he pulls along the ground to deep midwicket
full, and very wide outside off stump. Wants to clatter a drive, but he misses. Ball is inside the tramlines so wide not given
good length, on middle. Wants to cut, but eventually just places the shot behind point for a smart single
short and wide, and Balbirnie stands tall to cut behind backward point and point
good length, on middle, and tapped towards cover for a quick single
back of a length, on middle and leg. Cramping him for space, and defended from near his chest
full, just outside off, and swept to deep midwicket
full, outside off, and he clears his front leg before hammering it to long off

good length, outside off, and he looks to cut. Sliced to point, but the throw is sharp, and the keeper clips the bails off. Was Balbirnie late to get back? We are checking. Balbirnie had lost his bat while coming back, and had to knee himself into the crease, which added a few seconds to his return. No he's fine
googly, length ball from outside off and turning into him, past his outside edge. Keeper whips the bails off but his back leg is in the crease
Full, on middle, and swept in the air! Keeper runs towards square leg, but falls just beyond him. He's riding his luck
full and wide outside off, and he sweeps this googly to deep midwicket
full, outside leg stump. And worked off his toes to deep midwicket
good length, on middle, and tapped down the ground to mid on
good length, on off, and he pulls this into the grass banks! Fifty in style
full outside off, and driven square for a single
good length, outside off, and cut to point. They scamper across for one
good length, wide outside off, and he cuts square, where Mujeeb dives to stop, but the ball bursts through his palm. Afghanistan conceding more runs than they should
good length, on off, and turning in. Slices towards point
full, on middle, and he looks to clear the bowler, but sliced in the air. Rashid calls for the catch and runs backwards to take the catch. Stirling was looking dangerous here...
full, outside off, and driven with the turn. To cover point
good length, outside off, and cut to point. Can't beat the infield
full outside off, and the googly is driven to deep extra cover
good length, outside off, and turning in. Tries to defend, but inside-edged onto his pads
good length, wide outside off, and cut to cover point
full, on middle, and hammered back, but Janat sticks his right hand out to stop the ball from sneaking past
full and wide, and the attempted drive is edged to third man
full toss, on middle, and punched down the ground to long off
back of a length, outside off, and he drags a pulled shot into cow corner. Enough time to take the second run
low full toss, outside off, and he opens the bat's face to slice a four past point. Was searching for the yorker but the execution was missing
driven towards cover
good length, outside off, and the googly is cut to point. Very little room to work with
tossed up outside off, and he goes for the release shot. Tries to send it over cow corner, but slices it instead. Two fielders converging to take the catch, but the ball lands short of both men
timed! Full, on off, and turning into Balbirnie. He shuffles across the stumps and paddle sweeps past short fine leg
chopped on! Good length, outside off, and the attempted cut takes an inside edge and pegs off stump back
reverse sweep first ball, but edged to the leg side instead. This was full and wide outside off stump, meant to turn into him
back of a length, outside off, and he tries to cut. But too close to his body, and he misses the shot. Comfortably taken by the keeper
back of a length, quite wide outside off. He mistimes the cut, sliced behind square on the off side
good length, on middle, and angling into the stumps. Makes room to get leg-side of the delivery, and then guides it towards point for a quick single
good length outside off and angling into the stumps. He makes room and clatters a cut in front of square
back of a length on middle, and Tector sways away from the ball's line, opening the bat's face and running it down to third man
full and wide outside off, and he opens the bat's face before swinging it hard. Sliced, but safely over point. Shades of Steve Smith in that shot...
just past short third man! Full outside off, and the attempts to drive over the infield. But it takes the edge, and nearly earns the bowler a wicket
full, outside off, but he picks the turn better this time. Gets to the pitch of the ball with a big stride and then deposits it up and over the infield
good length, outside off, and he goes for a leg-side heave. Protection at cow corner though
good length, outside off stump. Pushes towards it to find the gap towards cover, but misses the shot
half-tracker outside off, but angling into the stumps. Flat-batted to long on after making a bit of room
expensive spell from Mujeeb today. Yorker length, on leg stump, and he can't flick it square. Ball stays near his toes...
back of a length, from around the wicket. He makes room to cut, but mistimes the shot instead
full, on off, and he wants to loft it over the infield. Does it successfully, but not as powerfully. They take just one
top of middle! Good length, angling in, and he makes room to slog over deep midwicket. Ball stays low, goes under his bat, and brings Delany's innings to a close
good length, outside off, and he cuts this fine. Fielder at third man runs to his right to intercept the boundary
good length, on off, and he wants to cut, but under-edged onto the deck. Ball rolls away to the off side and they scamper across for a single as well
switch hit to end the over. Full on leg stump, but he changes the grip to try and go over cover point. Clears the infield, but there's protection in the deep
good length, on middle, but he goes for the sweep anyway. Top-edged, and Mujeeb gets under it from deep backward square, but he ends up dropping it! Rashid isn't pleased...
he redeems himself! Full, outside off, and goes for the sweep again. Top-edged once more, but this time Mujeeb slides in sharply to take a low catch
full, on off, and he gets down on one knee to slog sweep this between deep midwicket and long on
appeal for lbw as he misses the paddle sweep, but the ball is likely going past leg stump
full, on off, and tapped off the front foot to the gap near mid on. Rashid has to give the ball a chase, and that allows the batsmen to scamper back for the second run
good length, outside off, and worked off his pads to square leg for a single. 3-22 for Rashid

full, on leg stump, and clipped to deep midwicket. They want the second, but the throw is flat, and it looks like the batsmen at the keeper's end is short. The slide from Singh was good, and the bat is inside the crease, but it's in the air and therefore not grounded
good length, on middle, and flicked to deep midwicket
good length, on middle, and he stands tall before hammering a pull over deep midwicket
back of a length, on middle, and he shapes to pull. Ball goes over his shoulder
ridiculous! Makes room and reverse paddles this past short third man! Doesn't have the distance for this full toss to go for four though
back of a length, on leg, and he comes down the wicket before clubbing a shot to deep midwicket. They come back for two, and Ireland finish on 172 for 6
full outside off, defended to cover.
full on off-stump again, defended
good length on middle and leg, batsman misses the flick
slower and flighted on off stump. Zazai smashes it over long off for six! Free swing of the arms
pushes the batsman back with a good length ball. The batsmen run a single after the tap towards long on.
good length on off stump again. Gurbaz defends back to the bowler.
good length on leg stump. The batsmen run a leg bye as the ball goes to point off his pads
shorter on off stump. The top edge flies for a six over the keeper's head as the batsman attempts a pull
defended to point off this full delivery. The batsmen scamper for a tight single as the throw comes at the non-striker manages a run.
short of length on leg stump. Zazai pulls and runs it fine past the short fine leg fielder for four.
good length on leg stump again. Zazai tries to clip, but it is a leg bye again
fuller on middle stump and Gurbaz flicks it for four over mid-wicket. The fielder gave a chase but the ball was far quicker
length ball tapped on the leg side. Zazai quickly runs a single
good length ball outside off. The ball had pace and swing as it moved away from the right-handed Gurbaz and he let it go.
full on off stump and Gurbaz smashes it past the bowler for four. A lot of power in that shot and mid on had no chance.
shorter on off-stump this time as Gurbaz tries to pull.
good length on middle. Gurbaz pulls and the ball reaches the fence beyond the square leg fielder
short of a length outside off. He taps and the batsmen run a quick two with third man stopping a clear boundary
good length on leg stump. Zazai attempts a flick but misses and the ball hits his pad.
flicked effortlessly and that sails for six. Fuller on off stump, Zazai clears his front leg and sends that for the maximum
slower ball outside off. Zazai attempts the same shot again but is completely beaten
short of a good length. Zazai swivels to pull behind square. Yet another boundary for him.
similar length but with a change of pace. He flicks it towards short fine leg and they run an easy single
short outside off and the attempted ramp is missed. Wide ball called.
slower ball full on middle and off. He taps to square leg and completes an easy run. Team fifty
full outside off
full again on off stump. Gurbaz sweeps as the umpire ducks for cover.
and given! He attempted sweep again but missed the fuller ball this time which would have hit middle stump. Ireland get their first breakthrough.
slower and full on middle. Defended by Janat
Good length on middle. He taps towards long on to get off the mark
bowled him! The ball stayed low as Zazai tried to cut, but a bottom edge took his off-stump as Singh gets both openers in the same over
good length on off and defended to cover
shorter on middle and off. Janat cracks it with power but a diving point saves at least a couple
is that a run out? Yes, he's gone! Simi Singh's direct hit from square leg accounts for the Afghanistan captain Afghan. It was touch and go, with Singh sending back another batsman
good length and tapped for a single to third man
length ball on middle and leg. Batsmen take a leg bye towards square leg.
short of a length, tapped to the leg side and an easy single for the batsmen
good length and he taps it towards point
shorter and he cuts it finely towards third man for a single
under edge as he tries to pull from outside off
he swings but misses! Fuller on off stump and the ball moves away from him
shorter on middle and leg. He helps it along to fine leg for a single
bouncer but called a wide. He tried to pull but the ball was too high
creams this past cover for four. This was full and without much foot movement, he swings it for a boundary
starts with a shorter ball from around the wicket. Outside off and he taps towards mid-wicket
taps to the leg side for a single again
guided to point for a single
is it a run out again? There was confusion among the batsmen for the second run and he is clearly short of his crease. Quick work from the keeper for taking the throw from deep backward square
full on middle and off. He runs a quick single after tapping it to short fine leg
half tracker on middle and he uppishly lofts it over the bowler's head. The bowler jumped but the ball goes over his fingertips. Mid off cleans up
wide down the leg side.
tapped to the right of mid on
full on middle and tapped off the back foot to short third man
swept for four towards deep square . Down on one knee and sends it for a one bounce four
defended to cover off the front ball
fuller and defended back to the bowler off the front foot
again full and defended again. This time he taps to towards cover
slower ball on middle and leg. He defends with soft hands back to the bowler
change of pace again. Brilliant diving stop at point as he tried to guide it.
good running. It was just steered into the leg side as they rapidly ran another two with the throw coming in
slower ball again on off stump. Pushed towards long off
this was short outside off. He pulled it powerfully towards deep midwicket but they can manage only a single
good length on middle and off. He opens the face of the bat and runs it towards deep point
reverse sweep off this full ball. Takes the top edge but lands safely short of the fielder at short third man
overpitched outside off, easy single towards deep extra cover
full on off again. Shinwari bunts for a single
half-tracker on middle and leg. Pulled in the gap between deep midwicket and long on
fuller outside off this time and another boundary for Afghanistan. He drives it beautifully and sends it to the cover fence.
defends this ball as it stays low at his off stump
good length on off and he punches this to long off the back foot
that's just beyond the diving fielder at long off! He swings hard as Dockrell pitches it full on off and it just clears the fence.
guided off his hips to square leg
full outside off, opens the bat face and guides it towards point
good length on middle. He defends with soft hands towards square leg off the back foot
another boundary. This was tossed up outside off and sent one bounce over extra cover
good length and that was pushed just beyond cover for a couple.
good length on off stump. He defends to point and his refused a single by the non-striker
cracked beyond the square leg boundary. Short of a length on middle and he pulled it off the front foot with power
slower ball and good length on off. He tries to cut but gets a bottom edge
was that a drop? He tried to guide it past short third man, but was dropped by KoB as the ball came low
takes the pace off again and it is yet another misfield. He cut it but the point fielder let it go
punched off the back foot to the left of mid-off
a bit of an inside edge towards long on as the bowler gives the chase. Shinwari dived at the non-striker's end and made his ground
shorter and cut towards deep point for a comfortable run
short again and cut again towards the same region
fuller on off. He pushes it towards cover without much foot movement
full on off and he attempts a cut but finds the point fielder
full outside off and that sails over wide long off for the maximum. Powerfully sent over the rope
driven down the ground towards long on off this fuller ball on leg stump
short on off. He attempts a pull but misses and the ball hits his chest region
short again outside off but this time the ball comes back into the right hander. He lets that go to the keeper
bouncer again! Rankin uses his height to good effect and pitches this on off stump
middle stump pegged back! It was full on off as he went for the pull but the ball took the bottom edge to send him back
